pullrequest.title: Explicitly set the cmake_minimum_required policy version for package config files

content.raw:
That's a really good catch. I expected these variables to be set by `cmake _minimum_required(~)`, but instead it's simply based on the version of the cmake binary executable itself.

I'm going to look for a way to identify the version that was requested from `cmake_minimum_required(~)`, but if I can't find such a thing, then I guess we'll have little choice but to manually keep these lines up to date with the `cmake_minimum_required(~)` settings of the root `CMakeLists.txt`.
